name: flesh (itch) (bloodpraxis)
description:
An entry for World of Darkness' Vampire: the Masquerade Jam 2022.

Synopsis

Embraced into clan Tzimisce by your lover, you've been bound by her blood more often than not. Tonight, you must decide: would this be your forever, or perhaps it's all trick of the blood.

Features

Flesh is a short visual novel with four endings and several different ways to reach them. Collect them all to see the whole picture.

Credits

Free images courtesy of Unsplash and Pexels. Music: ‘cnc machine’, ‘placid’ by Perry Butler (glassocean.net) via OpenGameArt.org, ‘The Field Of Dreams’ by pauliuw via OpenGameArt.org, ‘Clocktower’ by symphony (soundcloud.com/symphony) via OpenGameArt.org, ‘Doubts’ by Tsorthan Grove under CC-BY 4.0 via OpenGameArt.org, ‘City of Scrap’ by FoxSynergy under CC-BY 3.0 via OpenGameArt.org

This game was created as a part of Vampire: The Masquerade game jam under Dark Pack Agreement. Events portrayed in this game are not canon within World of Darkness universe.

Support

Please do not hesitate to leave a comment below detailing any bugs or typos you've come across in-game. Your help is greatly appreciated!
